channel.title: CVE Feed for satollo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for satollo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5317|2024-06-05T13:58:47.817Z -- satollo -- newsletter%20%E2%80%93%20send%20awesome%20emails%20from%20wordpress
item.description: The Newsletter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'np1' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 8.3.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Newsletter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'np1' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 8.3.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
